text: Hamidreza Sadri (born on 3 July 2000, in Tehran ) is an Iranian taekwondo athlete. He is the holder of the silver medal of the 2017 Asian Youth Championship in Kazakhstan and the gold medal of the 2018 World Army Championship in Brazil. He won the title of the most technical player in these competitions. He is now playing for the national taekwondo team of the Republic of Azerbaijan. == Honors == * Gold medal of the World Army Championship in Brazil 2018 * Silver medal of Kazakhstan Asian Junior Championship 2017 * Silver medal of Open Croatia 2012 * Gold medal of Open Lebanon 2018 * Silver medal of Fajr Open 2019 * Bronze medal of Open Albania 2022 * Bronze medal of Open Netherlands 2022 == References == == Other websites == Hamidreza Sadri on Instagram Category:People from Tehran Category:Living people Category:2000 births
title: Hamidreza Sadri
